name: Tower of Destiny (WIP)
description: This build represents only about 2% of the total game. A person makes his way through life   trying to find his way to heaven. The total game will consist of about 100 characters and different situations the player will go through. The game, teaches   various truths  from the Bible  along with other things that may lead the player astray.  I very much would like anyone's feedback as to  what might need to be changed or new ideas for me to implement.
